```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
times = c(30.49, 107.15, 226.76, 387.46, 592.91)
size = c(79,158,237,315, 394)
plot(times ~ size)
```

```{r}
time_data = data.frame(times, size)

ggplot(data = time_data, aes(x=size, y=times)) + geom_point() + theme_minimal() + labs(y = "Time (seconds)", x = "FASTA size (KB)") 
```
